name: floor
story: You are on the casino floor.
nav: Press (1) to play Poker (2) to play Casino Wars (3) for Black Jack

name: Poker
story: Turns out you are god at poker. You just won $200
nav: Press (1) to play Balck Jack (2) to play Roulette (3) for Craps

name: Casino Wars
story: Bad Luck You just lost $50
nav: Press (1) to play Baccarat (2) to play 3 Card Poker (3) for 5 Card Draw

name: Black Jack
story: You are really good at Black Jack!!  You won $100
nav: Press (1) to play Craps (2) Go back to the Casino Floor (3) Take a break and go the washroom

name: 3 Card Poker
story: You just won $ 50
nav: Press (1) to play Rummy (2) Go back to the Wheel Of Fortune (3) Play Teen Patti

name: Roulette
story: Roulette is your Game !! You just won $300
nav: Press (1) Play Teen Patti (2) Bet on a Sports (3) Play Tic Tac Toe

name: Craps
story: Sadly you just lost $150!
nav: Press (1) To Bet on a Boxing Match (2) To play on Slot Machines  (3) Play Casino Wars

name: Baccarat
story: You bet all you money and lost everything!!

name: 5 Card Draw
story: You just won $ 500
nav: Press (1) To play Wheel of Fortune (2) To play Black Jack  (3) Go to the Casino Floor

name: Bathroom
story: You took a much needed break, you just gained 20 Health points!!
nav: Press (1) Bet on Sport (2) To Talk to the Next Person in the Washroom  (3) Go to Slot Machine

name: Rummy
story: You Just lost $200
nav: Press (1) To play 3 card Poker (2) To Play Baccarat  (3) To Bet on a Boxing Match

name: Wheel of fortune
story: Turns out you are not very Fortunate! You just lost $250

name: Teen Patti
story: You just Lost $100!!
nav: Press (1) To play Teen Patti (2) To Play 3 Card Poker  (3) To play Black jack

name: Bet
story: Your Team Won! And Your ticket also won the luky Draw! You win 1 Million

name: Slot Machines
story: Congratulation you just Won $250!!!
nav: Press (1) To play Rummy (2) To play wheel of Fortune  (3) To Go on a crazy betting spree

name: tic tac toe
story: You Won $50
nav: Press (1) To play 5 Card Poker (2) To talk to a person sitting next to you  (3) To bet on a Boxing Match

name: Go Crazy
story: You are really crazzzyyyyy!!! But unfortunately you bet all your money on a single bet and lost!!

name: Gangster
story: Unfortunately the stranger turns out to be a gangster and takes all your money!!

name: Boxing
story: Congratulation you just won $200!!!

name: Golden Boolean
